chat_history.message:
Hello, My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem. Thank you for your help,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the item, or 2 working days to process a refund if possible.
The customer has met the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ They have confirmed that the device has not been opened by a third party nor damaged (through drop or water exposure).
✔ They have the return label.
✔ They know that all accessories and the receipt must be included with the package.
✔ They know that the package must arrive within 14 days at your location.
Don't forget: As soon as the package arrives, sellers have 3 working days to repair or replace the product (5 working days for laptops and household appliances), or 2 working days to process a refund.

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order and refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
